SEARCH

webfx-platform 0.1.0-SNAPSHOT API

Modules
Module
Description
webfx.platform.arch
Cross-platform Arch API which provides information about the platform architecture (see Arch).
webfx.platform.ast.yaml
 
webfx.platform.async
Platform-independent API for asynchronous operations (such as the Fetch API provided by the webfx-platform-fetch module) (see Future & Promise).
webfx.platform.audio
Cross-platform Audio API.
webfx.platform.boot
Cross-platform API & SPI for booting WebFX applications.
webfx.platform.conf
 
webfx.platform.conf.file.java
 
webfx.platform.console
Cross-platform API for logging in the console (see Console).
webfx.platform.fetch
Cross-platform Fetch API (mock of the Web Fetch API) for fetching remote resources such as Json web services (see Fetch).
webfx.platform.fetch.json
 
webfx.platform.file
Cross-platform API for accessing local files (mock of the Web File API).
webfx.platform.json
Cross-platform Json API (see Json).
webfx.platform.os
Cross-platform OS API for getting information about the host operating system (see OperatingSystem).
webfx.platform.resource
Cross-platform Resource API for accessing local resources (see Resource).
webfx.platform.scheduler
Cross-platform Scheduler API for scheduling non-UI tasks (see Scheduler).
webfx.platform.shutdown
Cross-platform Shutdown API for shutting down WebFX applications (see Shutdown).
webfx.platform.storage
Cross-platform Storage API for client-side storage (see LocalStorage & SessionStorage).
webfx.platform.storagelocation
Cross-platform StorageLocation API for locating application internal file storage (see StorageLocation).
webfx.platform.substitution
 
webfx.platform.substitution.var
 
webfx.platform.substitution.var.conf
 
webfx.platform.substitution.var.env
 
webfx.platform.substitution.var.localstorage
 
webfx.platform.substitution.var.sysprop
 
webfx.platform.substitution.var.windowlocation
 
webfx.platform.uischeduler
Cross-platform UiScheduler API for scheduling UI tasks (see UiScheduler).
webfx.platform.useragent
Cross-platform UserAgent API for getting information about the user agent (see UserAgent).
webfx.platform.visibility
Cross-platform Visibility API to know and react to the application visibility state (see Visibility).
webfx.platform.webassembly
Cross-platform WebAssembly API for working with WebAssembly (see WebAssembly).
webfx.platform.webworker
Cross-platform WebWorker API for working with web workers (see WebWorkerService).
webfx.platform.windowhistory
Cross-platform WindowHistory API for accessing the window history (see WindowHistory).
webfx.platform.windowlocation
Cross-platform WindowLocation API for accessing the window location (see WindowLocation).
